detail_desc: Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, an imitation suede peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops. Soft terry inside. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors).
V-neck top in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace sections and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and contrasting colour trims and side stripes.
Wide cardigan in a fine-knit wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey vest top with a print motif.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch denim with a heart-shaped chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and visible seams front and back.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back with a safety button at the top. Seam at the waist and a slightly stretchy skirt with a slit at the back. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Calf-length skirt in a soft rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and decorative metal buttons down the front. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Lightweight, unlined liner socks in fast-drying functional fabric with reinforcement at the toes and heels.

Shirt in a cotton and linen weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Dress in glittery tulle with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Short butterfly sleeves in double-layered tulle and a gathered seam at the hem with a flared flounce. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.

Push-up lace bralette with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that meet at the back and finish with a lace trim, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Warm-lined boots in imitation suede with imitation leather details, and an ankle-height shaft with lacing at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Blouse in a soft, airy, patterned viscose weave with long, wide sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. V-neck with ties at the top, a gathered seam under the bust and a flared peplum.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and an adjustable tab with a plastic fastener at the back. Zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets and front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, Diagonal pockets on top of the front pockets with partial fleece lining. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Ribbed, calf-length dress in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and a reflective detail.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some wool with wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Sports trousers in fast-drying mesh with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with jersey stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Vest top in airy jersey made from a cotton blend with deep armholes.
High-waisted leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fancy dress costume in glossy, patterned velour with long sleeves, long legs and a deep neckline at the back.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in lightweight, washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, diagonal side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, pleats at the front and shaping darts at the back. Zip fly and button and wide, gently tapered legs.
Skirt in sequin-embroidered tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a decorative knot at the front.

Short dress in viscose crêpe with lace insets. The dress has an opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and yoke in mesh, a concealed zip in the side and gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Trousers in a viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless top in satin with lace details and a deep V-neck front and back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Body in sturdy microfibre that holds in and shapes the waist. Adjustable shoulder straps and unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Folded, glued seams at the top and around the hems for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.

Playsuit in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in sequined mesh with a concealed zip in one side and high slit at the front. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, purl-knit cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Jacket in patterned, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front.
Lace dress with a V-neck at the back, 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with a silk ribbon tie detail. Lined front and skirt.
Trainers in mesh, imitation leather and imitation suede with reflective details and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Short, round-necked dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in softly draping satin with a concealed button band down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative press-studs, zipped side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey body in a loose fit at the top with notch lapels and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Dropped shoulders, long, tapered sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.

Padded, gently fitted jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Fleece-lined front pockets with a press-stud. Lined. Polyester filling.
Short lace dress with buttons at the back and an elasticated seam at the waist with a wide frill trim. Short, scallop-edged sleeves and a scalloped hem. Jersey inner dress.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Long metal earrings with faceted plastic stones. Length 9 cm.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. The zip has a chin guard. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of all-in-one suit is organic.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short wide sleeves in woven fabric with broderie anglaise and a scalloped trim.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Swim top and long trousers in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist. UPF 50.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, a padded, detachable hood with a faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets with a press-stud, a sleeve pocket with a flap and press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring. Crocheted lace trims at the front and hems.
Wide V-neck cardigan in scuba fabric with buttons down the front, diagonal front pockets, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and smocking over the shoulders. Unlined.
Wide top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
Blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short dolman sleeves. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a hole pattern and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support. Made partly from recycled polyester and polyamide.
Short-sleeved lace top with a round neckline and concealed zip at the back of the neck. Partly lined.
